TopicTitle: show your pictures of your early space crafts and rover models

Articles.Content:
Hello do you still remember your first time getting to orbit or the first time you tried to land a rover on the moon this thread is to honor your very first creations (you may also post early achievements like your first sattelite ect.)

Here is my very first space craft its called the mini sputnik mk1 can reach a maxium altitude of 10384m

This is my first rover lander it is called Lunokhod i dont know the specifications

this is it successful

and here is it not so successful

so there you have it go ahead and show of your very first creations and or achievements

ps: srry for bad spellin and engilsh

The first Mun orbiter

It barely made it back to Kerbal

This is my first (documented) landing. It`s on Duna and it`s a bit, well, rube-goldbergish.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The first set of parachutes opens, slowing the craft down a bit like a drogue, then when close to the ground, all the other stages are released and about 7 craft parachute to the surface giving a base, manned kethane rover and a few auto rovers.

worked OK but the smaller rovers tended to break on impact.

My very first and lame rover!

My first airplane, powered with a rocket, because I didn't know why the jet engine wouldn't fire up. I had no intakes!

wow cool never tought about putitng more than one rover on a rocket.

also very neat first designs al of you some of them remind me of my own rockets

btw i made a mistake thats not my first rover i wil post a picture of my first one

this is my first rover its called test subject moon racer it was a big failure

and here some more pics

this rocket made the first orbit around kerbin

and this is his probe after successful mission called sputnik (very original)

also my final pic for today will be my first ever created space station around kerbin with 3 docked ships with solar panels.

so i hope to see some more awesome first creations achievements or prototypes.
